output_list.description: The ToOwner function allows the owner to claim ownership of the contract, disregarding the provided period.
The PayWinner function uses a random number to determine the winner, allowing attackers to manipulate the outcome.
The MintToken function allows unauthorized increase of total supply, disregarding the provided period.
The setParameters function allows unauthorized modification of the value and minReq parameters, disregarding the provided period.
The ToOwner function allows unauthorized reinitialization of the contract, disregarding the provided period.
